search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_disk.Percent_Free_Space OR metric_name=win_disk.Free_Megabytes host=* by metric_name, instance | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(win_disk.*) as "*" by instance | eval Percent_Free_Space=round(Percent_Free_Space, 2), "disk total (GB)"=round((Free_Megabytes/Percent_Free_Space)*100/1024, 2), "disk free (GB)"=round(Free_Megabytes/1024, 2) | rename Percent_Free_Space as "disk free (%)" | fields instance, "disk free (GB)", "disk free (%)", "disk total (GB)" | sort 0 instance
